Use your browser developer tools to see the grid respond to different screen sizes.

How to Use

Set up basic section, row and col

This is a section test!.

More Customizations

Adding #-mob will make the column responsive for all screen sizes because it starts with mobile sizes.
If you want to make a custom column that acts like a #-mob but has your own dimensions. First add the .col class then customize this code. Each breakpoint represents a @media change.

In your HTML add
Welcome to Mangree
To begin using Mangree use the following html to setup grid containers

<div class="section">
  <div class="row">
    <div class="col smtab-12">
      <p>ff</p>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>
Addingclass='link-clr-change'to the navbar a tags will change the color on scroll with the when the
code class='nav-clr-change'
is present in the nav tag.

  <li><a class="link-clr-change" href="#">Home</a></li>






$(window).resize(function() {
  if (window.innerWidth > 768) {
    $("#nav").removeAttr("style");
  }
  }); //END three-line nav
